channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The shutdown leaves telehealth for Medicare patients in limbo
item.description: Telehealth for Medicare started during the pandemic and became popular quickly. But the shutdown put an abrupt halt to payments for the service.

item.title: AI steps in to detect the world's deadliest infectious disease
item.description: There's a global shortage of radiologists. Now artificial intelligence is helping speed up the diagnosis of tuberculosis in hard-to-reach communities.
